00001 // OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor.cc
00002 #ifdef ORROOT_HAS_FFTW
00003 #include "OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor.hh"
00004 #include "TFFTRealComplex.h"
00005 #include "TMath.h"
00006 
00007 OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor::OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor() 
00008 {
00009   /* Inputs required. Vector sizes can change*/
00010   SetInput("Waveform", &fWaveform, "Set of points to be fourier transformed.");
00011   SetInput("FFTOptions", &fFFTOptions, 
00012     "FFT options (ES(timate), M(easure), P(atient), EX(haustive)). Only the capita letter is needed.");
00013 
00014   /* Outputs sent back to Orca. */
00015   SetOutput("FFTReal", &fOutputReal, "Real FFT values");
00016   SetOutput("FFTComplex", &fOutputComplex, "Complex FFT values");
00017 }
00018 
00019 bool OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor::ExecuteProcess()
00020 {
00021   /*  */
00022   fOutputReal.resize(fWaveform.size()/2 + 1);
00023   fOutputComplex.resize(fWaveform.size()/2 + 1);
00024   /* Since we're dealing with real data, only a certain number of values
00025    * are non-degenerate.  The rest is just the hermitian conjugate.     */  
00026 
00027   if (fWaveform.size() == 0 ) return true;
00028   /* Nothing to do! */
00029 
00030   /* Looking to see if we are supposed to do a Blackman or Hanning window. */
00031   std::string::size_type loc;
00032   if ((loc = fFFTOptions.find("WinBlack",0)) != std::string::npos ) {
00033     /* OK, we have to do Blackman windowing */
00034     for (size_t i=0;i<fWaveform.size();i++) {
00035       fWaveform[i] = fWaveform[i]*(0.42 - 0.5*TMath::Cos(i*TMath::TwoPi()/(fWaveform.size()-1))
00036         + TMath::Cos(2.*i*TMath::TwoPi()/(fWaveform.size()-1)));
00037     }
00038     fFFTOptions.erase(loc, 8);
00039   } else if ((loc = fFFTOptions.find("WinHamm")) != std::string::npos) {
00040     /* OK, we have to do Hamming windowing */
00041     for (size_t i=0;i<fWaveform.size();i++) {
00042       fWaveform[i] = fWaveform[i]*(0.54 - 0.46*TMath::Cos(i*TMath::TwoPi()/(fWaveform.size()-1)));
00043     }
00044     fFFTOptions.erase(loc, 7);
00045   }
00046   while ((loc = fFFTOptions.find(",")) != std::string::npos) {
00047     /* Getting rid of commas */
00048     fFFTOptions.erase(loc,1);
00049   } 
00050 
00051   TFFTRealComplex theFFTer(fWaveform.size(), kFALSE); 
00052   theFFTer.Init(fFFTOptions.c_str(), 0, 0);
00053   /* Setting up FFT, *not* in-place. 
00054    * Options correspond to "ES" (Estimate), "M" (measure), "P" (patient), 
00055    * "EX" (exhaustive).                                                   */
00056   
00057   theFFTer.SetPoints(&(fWaveform[0]));
00058   /* Setting the input points. */
00059   theFFTer.Transform();
00060   /* Run Transform */
00061 
00062   /*******************************************/
00063   theFFTer.GetPointsComplex(&(fOutputReal[0]),&(fOutputComplex[0]),kFALSE); 
00064   for (size_t i=0;i<fOutputComplex.size();i++) {
00065     fOutputReal[i] = fOutputReal[i]/TMath::Sqrt(fWaveform.size());
00066     fOutputComplex[i] = fOutputComplex[i]/TMath::Sqrt(fWaveform.size());
00067   }
00068   /* Setting output, rescaling, and we're done! */
00069   
00070   return true;
00071 }
00072 
00073 OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor::~OROrcaRequestFFTProcessor()
00074 {
00075 }
